name: Onmyoji: The Card Game
summary: Onmyoji: The Card Game, a spinoff of Onmyoji, is a duel card mobile game. Onmyoji: The Card Game inherits the aesthetic style from Onmyoji, with an exquisite Japanese fantasy style for the card drawings and scene design. You may choose 4 Shikigami for your duel, each can bring 8 exclusive cards. Build your deck with strategy and fight it out in the combat zone. A fast takedown with an aggression deck or a dazzling OTK with a Combo deck? It’s your choice.
